ApproxsimClient.communication
Class PriorityQueue

java.lang.Object
  ApproxsimClient.communication.PriorityQueue

public class PriorityQueue
extends Object

A thread safe priority queue with both blocking and non-blocking dequeue. The queue has FIFO behaviour when two Objects A and B are given the same priority.

Nested Class Summary
 class PriorityQueue.PQKey
          A class used as key in a PriorityQueue.

 Object blockingDequeue()
          Dequeues the Object with the highest priority or if the queue is empty - block until an Object is enqueued by another thread.

Method Detail

enqueue

public void enqueue(Object o,
                    int prio)
Enqueues an Object with priority prio.

Parameters:
o - The Object to be enqueued.
prio - The priority of the enqueued Object.

dequeue

public Object dequeue()
Dequeues the Object with the highest priority.

Returns:
The Object with the highest priority in the queue or null if the queue is empty.

clear

public void clear()
Removes all entries in the queue

blockingDequeue

public Object blockingDequeue()
Dequeues the Object with the highest priority or if the queue is empty - block until an Object is enqueued by another thread.

Returns:
The Object with the highest priority in the queue.

empty

public boolean empty()
Checks if the queue is empty.

Returns:
true if the queue is empty, false otherwise.

size

public int size()
Returns the size of the queue.

Returns:
size of the queue.
